program main

    implicit none

    integer :: n, m
    integer, allocatable :: a(:)
    integer :: ans =0
    integer :: prev_base =0
    integer :: new_base, r
    integer :: i, j
    logical :: found
    type frequency_type
        integer :: key
        integer :: count
    end type frequency_type
    type(frequency_type), allocatable :: frequency(:)

    ! Read input
    read*, n, m
    allocate(a(n))
    read*, a

    ! Initialize frequency as empty
    allocate(frequency(0))

    ! Process first part
    do i =1, n
        r = mod(a(i), m)
        new_base = mod(prev_base - r, m)

        ! Find count of new_base in frequency
        found = .false.
        do j=1, size(frequency)
            if (frequency(j)%key == new_base) then
                ans = ans + frequency(j)%count
                found = .true.
                exit
            end if
        end do

        ! Now, add prev_base to frequency
        found = .false.
        do j=1, size(frequency)
            if (frequency(j)%key == prev_base) then
                frequency(j)%count = frequency(j)%count +1
                found = .true.
                exit
            end if
        end do

        if (.not. found) then
            ! Append to frequency
            allocate(temp(size(frequency)+1))
            temp(1:size(frequency)) = frequency
            temp(size(frequency)+1)%key = prev_base
            temp(size(frequency)+1)%count =1
            deallocate(frequency)
            frequency = temp
        end if

        prev_base = new_base
    end do

    ! Now, compute second part using ans as position
    integer(8) :: position = ans
    integer(8) :: nrstSeqStartIndx =1
    integer(8) :: val

    ! First loop: find upper bound
    do while (getValueAtIndex(nrstSeqStartIndx *2) < position)
        nrstSeqStartIndx = nrstSeqStartIndx *2
    end do

    ! Second loop: find exact start
    do while (getValueAtIndex(nrstSeqStartIndx +1) <= position)
        nrstSeqStartIndx = nrstSeqStartIndx +1
    end do

    val = getValueAtIndex(nrstSeqStartIndx)
    print*, (position - val) +1

contains

    integer(8) function getValueAtIndex(index)
        integer(8), intent(in) :: index
        getValueAtIndex = 1 + (index-1)*index/2
    end function

end program
